title: Box Braids
description: Focus on parting and neatness. Our signature box braids are known for razor-sharp parts and consistent density, designed to last 6-8 weeks while protecting your natural hair.

title: Bohemian Braids
description: Focus on the Signature Crowns look. We blend high-quality extensions with goddess curls to create a voluminous, ethereal look tailored to your face shape.

title: Knotless Braids
description: Focus on scalp comfort and the natural look. Our knotless technique starts with your natural hair, ensuring zero tension on the follicleâ€”perfect for those prioritizing hair growth and comfort.

title: Passion Twists
description: Soft, bouncy, and lightweight Passion Twists designed to protect your natural crown.

title: Cornrows
description: Focus on symmetry. From simple straight backs to intricate patterns, our cornrow services emphasize symmetry and scalp health.

title: Fulani Braids
description: Elegant Fulani-inspired styles mixing cornrows and box braids for a striking cultural statement.

title: Lemonade Braids
description: Signature side-swept Lemonade braids executed with structural perfection.

title: Faux Locs
description: Stunning, realistic Faux Locs providing a long-term protective style with a natural finish.

title: Goddess Braids
description: Thick, regal Goddess braids combined with curly leave-outs for unparalleled volume.

title: Senegalese Twists
description: Smooth and elegant Senegalese Twists crafted using the two-strand method for a polished look.

title: Tribal Braids
description: Intricate tribal patterns demonstrating advanced geometric parting and styling.

title: Crochet Braids
description: Fast and safe Crochet installations offering endless style variations with zero tension.

title: Micro Braids
description: Delicate, tiny micro braids offering the flexibility of freely moving hair with the protection of braids.

title: Jumbo Braids
description: Bold, statement-making jumbo braids for a striking aesthetic and quicker installation.

title: Spring Twists
description: Short, coiled spring twists that deliver a playful, voluminous style perfect for summer.

name: Ponytails & Updos
description: Sophisticated Braided Ponytails & High-Crown Styles. Focus on structural integrity. Perfect for events or daily elegance, our braided ponytails are secured for longevity without compromising comfort.
